trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hillsboro
There were no other sightings in Hillsboro on or around November 6th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsRight side came below skyline first, then left side. It only lasted a couple of minutes I think, I asked my daughter "What is that?" though I already knew, and she replied "A UFO". What confuses me is that the store we were heading to is only a 3 minute drive and wouldn't have normally taken us more than 10 minutes to get there, get what we wanted and get back home, but an hour had lapsed that night.
Summary: Beautiful Gold triangle that was magnificently awesome!
